content.question: In lines 11-13 (“Cares . . . thorn”), the speaker suggests that

choices.label: the nightingale’s cares are only transitory
poetry is unlike the nightingale’s song
poetic creation and unhappiness are linked

content.answer: poetic creation and unhappiness are linked

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
